item.title: 韩国权衡美国投资承诺以削减汽车关税
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，美国和韩国已经讨论过建立一个投资美国项目的基金，作为贸易协议的一部分，这与日本周二与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成的协议类似。【原文：The US and South Korea have discussed creating a fund to invest in American projects as part of a trade deal, similar to an agreement Japan struck Tuesday with President Donald Trump, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 托德-布利支持的 Accelerant 公司和控股公司在首次公开募股中募集 7.24 亿美元资金
item.description: Accelerant Holdings 及其部分支持者在美国首次公开募股中筹集了 7.24 亿美元，价格高于市场定价范围，这是最近一次与保险相关的上市，需求旺盛。【原文：Accelerant Holdings and some of its backers raised $724 million in an upsized US initial public offering priced above the marketed range, the latest insurance-related listing to meet with strong demand.】

item.title: 美国贸易协议前景乐观，避险需求减弱，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 由于美国与主要贸易伙伴之间的谈判取得进展，损害了避险资产的需求，黄金维持跌势。【原文：Gold held a decline as progress in talks between the US and key trading partners hurt demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 教育科技公司麦格劳希尔首次公开募股融资 4.146 亿美元
item.description: 麦格劳-希尔公司（McGraw Hill Inc.【原文：McGraw Hill Inc. raised $414.6 million in its US initial public offering, pricing shares of the education company below its marketed range.】

item.title: 米莱的核心圈子看到执政党希望之星出现裂痕
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）有影响力的妹妹正试图平息执政党内的不同意见，这些意见有可能使这位自由主义领导人在即将举行的两次关键选举中的前景变得复杂。【原文：The influential sister of Argentine President Javier Milei is trying to quash dissent within the ruling party that threatens to complicate the libertarian leader’s prospects in a pair of crucial upcoming elections.】

item.title: 美国贸易关税前景不明，石油价格稳定，库存成为关注焦点
item.description: 石油价格在连续下跌后企稳，投资者关注美国贸易谈判的进展和低库存水平。【原文：Oil steadied after a string of losses, with investors looking to US trade talk progress and low inventory levels.】

item.title: 摩根大通和美国银行领导人因 CATL IPO 事宜被美国立法者传唤
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）因在中国电池制造商当代安培科技股份有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.Ltd.首次公开募股中扮演的角色。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Bank of America Corp. were subpoenaed by US lawmakers over their role in the initial public offering of Chinese battery maker Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd.】

item.title: 新西兰央行行长称奥尔对财政部官员 "失去了冷静
item.description: 新西兰储备银行行长尼尔-奎格利（Neil Quigley）就行长阿德里安-奥尔（Adrian Orr）的行为向财政部官员道歉，而奥尔突然辞职还不到两周。【原文：Reserve Bank of New Zealand Chair Neil Quigley apologized to a Treasury Department official for the behavior of Governor Adrian Orr less than two weeks before Orr abruptly quit.】

item.title: 欧盟与中国在关键国防物资供应问题上的掐架搏斗
item.description: 在几乎不可能直接从中国采购稀土金属后，欧洲金属贸易商正日益疯狂地争夺稀土金属供应。【原文：European metals traders are engaged in an increasingly frantic scramble to secure rare-earth metal supplies after it became all but impossible to directly source them from China.】

item.title: 动荡之际，中国国家基金向 ETF 投资 280 亿美元
item.description: 中国主权财富基金中央汇金投资有限责任公司（Central Huijin Investment Ltd.，简称 "中央汇金"）在第二季度向交易所交易基金注入了约1,975亿元人民币（约合276亿美元）的资金，以抵御美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布加征关税后引发的股市暴跌。【原文：Chinese sovereign wealth fund Central Huijin Investment Ltd. pumped around 197.5 billion yuan ($27.6 billion) into exchange-traded funds in the second quarter, pushing back against a stock market rout that followed US President Donald Trump’s tariff announcements.】

item.title: 资本流入引发新加坡股市的价值追逐
item.description: 随着资金开始流入，新加坡 50 亿新元（39 亿美元）振兴股市的举措正促使投资者将目光投向价格昂贵的银行股之外，并在被忽视的行业中寻找价值。【原文：Singapore’s S$5 billion ($3.9 billion) push to revive its stock market is prompting investors to look beyond pricey bank shares and find value in overlooked sectors as capital starts flowing in.】

item.title: 韩国经济在关税和房地产风险中实现反弹
item.description: 韩国经济在上一季度出现小幅萎缩后，在下一季度恢复了增长，这表明即使在贸易紧张局势加剧、国内金融风险加深的情况下，韩国经济仍具有韧性。【原文：South Korea’s economy returned to growth last quarter after a modest contraction in the previous period, signaling resilience even as trade tensions simmer and domestic financial risks deepen.】

item.title: 马斯克将潜在的 xAI 投资交还给特斯拉股东
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）建议，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Elon Musk suggested any potential investment by Tesla Inc. in his artificial intelligence startup, xAI, should be proposed by the electric carmaker’s shareholders.】

item.title: 新丰泰能源公司在债券大跌中寻求 Houlihan 的建议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，亿万富翁投资者韦斯-埃登斯（Wes Edens）的新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy Inc.【原文：Billionaire investor Wes Edens’ New Fortress Energy Inc. has tapped Houlihan Lokey for advice in anticipation of talks with creditors to cut its debt load, according to people with knowledge of the situation who asked not to be identified because they’re not authorized to speak publicly.】

item.title: 股市上涨，避险天堂因贸易协议乐观情绪而后退：市场综述
item.description: 在美国与日本达成贸易协议以及与欧盟达成另一项贸易协议的迹象为股市注入新的活力之后，亚洲股市周四将继续攀升。避险资产回落。【原文：Asian equities were set to climb Thursday after a US trade deal with Japan and signs of another with the European Union injected fresh vigor into stocks. Haven assets retreated.】

item.title: 人工智能需求旺盛，SK 海力士利润和销售额创历史新高
item.description: SK 海力士公司（SK Hynix Inc.【原文：SK Hynix Inc. reported record quarterly profit that beat expectations, reinforcing its lead in advanced memory chips that help Nvidia Corp.’s processors develop artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 澳大利亚计划取消对美国牛肉的进口限制以安抚特朗普
item.description: 澳大利亚政府宣布打算取消对美国牛肉进口的限制，以安抚唐纳德-特朗普总统，特朗普曾强调堪培拉的生物安全措施是对贸易的不公平阻碍。【原文：The Australian government has announced it intends to remove restrictions on US beef imports in a bid to appease President Donald Trump, who had highlighted Canberra’s biosecurity measures as an unfair impediment to trade.】

item.title: 特朗普曾考虑与英伟达分手，但被告知 "很难
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普说，他曾考虑试图拆分英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp），以增加人工智能芯片领域的竞争，但后来发现 "做这一行并不容易"。【原文：President Donald Trump said he considered attempting to break up Nvidia Corp. to increase competition in artificial intelligence chips before finding out “it’s not easy in that business.”】

item.title: 日本意外达成贸易协议 股价由跌转赢
item.description: 周三意外宣布的美日贸易协议最终可能会成为股市许多行业命运的转折点，输家会变成赢家，反之亦然。【原文：The unexpected US-Japan trade deal announced Wednesday may end up being a tipping point for the fortunes of many sectors in the stock market — with losers turning into winners, and vice versa.】

item.title: 福特斯库铁矿石发货量增至季度最高纪录
item.description: Fortescue Ltd. 第四季度铁矿石发货量同比增长 4%，创下历史新高。【原文：Fortescue Ltd.’s shipments of iron ore rose 4% from a year earlier in the fourth quarter to a record.】

item.title: Blackstone 募集 50 亿美元用于二手基础设施投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 已为其最新基金募集了约 50 亿美元，该基金旨在对基础设施进行二次下注。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has gathered about $5 billion for its latest fund designed to make secondhand bets on infrastructure, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南方公司首席执行官警告说，如果电费不便宜，就会发生 "革命"。
item.description: 公用事业巨头南方电力公司（Southern Co.【原文：The chief of utility giant Southern Co. warned that Americans will revolt if they end up on the hook for the soaring power costs associated with AI demand.】

item.title: Ardagh 债权人将向所有者保罗-库尔森支付高达 3 亿美元的退出费用
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿达赫集团（Ardagh Group SA）的债权人将向亿万富翁老板保罗-库尔森（Paul Coulson）支付多达 3 亿美元，作为交出公司钥匙交易的一部分。【原文：Ardagh Group SA creditors are set to pay billionaire owner Paul Coulson as much as $300 million as part of a deal to hand over the keys to the company, according to people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 匈牙利 GKI 商业信心指数跌至五年来最低点
item.description: 匈牙利的商业信心指数跌至近五年来的最低水平，这再次表明匈牙利经济可能正处于另一次衰退的边缘。【原文：Hungary’s business confidence index plunged to its lowest level in almost five years, in another sign that the economy could be on the brink of another recession.】

item.title: Fibra Next 公司融资 4.31 亿美元，成为 2018 年以来墨西哥最大的 IPO
item.description: 墨西哥房地产投资信托公司 Fibra Next 通过首次公开募股筹集了 80 亿比索（约合 4.31 亿美元）的资金，这是该国七年来最大的一次股票发行。【原文：Mexican real estate investment trust Fibra Next raised 8 billion pesos ($431 million) through its initial public offering, the country’s biggest stock debut in seven years.】

item.title: 日本央行观察家仍预测下次加息在 10 月或 1 月
item.description: 彭博社在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布与日本达成贸易协议之前进行的一项调查显示，日本央行观察人士越来越多地预计日本央行将在 10 月或 1 月上调基准利率。【原文：Bank of Japan watchers increasingly expect authorities to raise the benchmark interest rate either in October or January, according to a Bloomberg survey conducted before US President Donald Trump announced a trade deal with Japan.】

item.title: 美国银行在新计划中回购 400 亿美元股票
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Bank of America Corp. announced a new $40 billion stock-buyback program, sending shares up.】

item.title: 原住民反对不列颠哥伦比亚省可能铺设石油管道
item.description: 不列颠哥伦比亚省的一个原住民团体向加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）发出一封公开信，敦促他拒绝在该省西北部地区修建输油管道或油轮项目的任何建议。【原文：A First Nations group in British Columbia sent an open letter to Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney urging him reject any proposal for a pipeline or oil tanker project in the northwest area of the province.】

item.title: 沃尔玛聘请 Instacart 高管加速人工智能应用
item.description: 沃尔玛公司正在从Instacart公司聘请一名高管，以加快人工智能的应用，这家全球最大的零售商希望借此增强其竞争优势。【原文：Walmart Inc. is hiring an executive from Instacart Inc. to accelerate its use of artificial intelligence as the world’s largest retailers looks to bolster its competitive edge.】

item.title: 服务诺（ServiceNow）发布强劲营收展望，吹捧人工智能销售额
item.description: 服务诺公司（ServiceNow Inc.【原文：ServiceNow Inc. gave a strong outlook for revenue growth and touted customer adoption of its artificial intelligence software tools.】
